name: AllieNation
description:
There was a World War in 2025. Everything was destroyed. But an A.I. named ALLIE made by one of the top scientist helped humans survive. There are no more nation left, it's just ALLIE's one united NATION.

Now everyone lives in bunkers. There has been attacks from enemy AI bots.

Will ALLIE be able to protect ALLIE's NATION?  Or the humans will be alienated?
